title: NTT Startup Challenge - Premier Startup Ecosystem Platform in Southeast Asia
description: Welcome to NTT Startup Challenge, the premier platform nurturing the Startup Ecosystem in Southeast Asia. Since 2016, we've empowered over 7,000 startups to secure funding, gain insights, and forge valuable partnerships.

og.title: NTT Startup Challenge 2024
og.description: Embark on a journey with hundreds startups across Southeast Asia, aiming to be among the top 10 finalists and vie for the top 3 winning spots.

twitter.title: NTT Startup Challenge 2024
twitter.description: Join Southeast Asia's premier startup platform. Connect with startups, government entities, and enterprises for potential collaborations and growth opportunities.

organization.name: NTT Startup Challenge
organization.description: A premier platform by NTT Group fostering startup growth and innovation in Southeast Asia
